thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Ohm by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not as described
thread.title_full: Not as described - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Ohm by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: karengs23
title: Not as described
text: I had researched this property online and when I arrived the room wasn't ready no portable wifi available no happy hour. Was offered compensation when I complained but that didn't happen. This was my dream to travel to Paris and as a single mom waited for years and this hotel had me in tears as I shouldn't have had to complain and although the director apologised things didn't change. A self catering option would have been better. Dashed my dreams.
